   23: -module(tls_1_3_version_SUITE).
   24: 
   25: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("public_key/include/public_key.hrl").
   27: %% Common test
   28: -export([all/0,
   29:          groups/0,
   30:          init_per_suite/1,
   31:          init_per_group/2,
   32:          end_per_suite/1,
   33:          end_per_group/2
   34:         ]).
   35: 
   36: %% Test cases
   37: -export([tls13_client_tls12_server/0,
   38:          tls13_client_tls12_server/1,
   39:          tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server/0,
   40:          tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server/1,
   41:          tls12_client_tls13_server/0,
   42:          tls12_client_tls13_server/1,
   43:          tls_client_tls10_server/0,
   44:          tls_client_tls10_server/1,
   45:          tls_client_tls11_server/0,
   46:          tls_client_tls11_server/1,
   47:          tls_client_tls12_server/0,
   48:          tls_client_tls12_server/1,
   49:          tls10_client_tls_server/0,
   50:          tls10_client_tls_server/1,
   51:          tls11_client_tls_server/0,
   52:          tls11_client_tls_server/1,
   53:          tls12_client_tls_server/0,
   54:          tls12_client_tls_server/1,
   55:          legacy_tls12_client_tls_server/0,
   56:          legacy_tls12_client_tls_server/1,
   57:          legacy_tls12_server_tls_client/0,
   58:          legacy_tls12_server_tls_client/1,
   59:          tls13_client_tls11_server/0,
   60:          tls13_client_tls11_server/1,
   61:          tls12_legacy_cert_sign/0,
   62:          tls12_legacy_cert_sign/1,
   63:          tls13_legacy_cert_sign/0,
   64:          tls13_legacy_cert_sign/1,
   65:          tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae/0,
   66:          tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae/1,
   67:          tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae/0,
   68:          tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae/1,
   69:          reject_legacy_cert/0,
   70:          reject_legacy_cert/1,
   71:          middle_box_tls13_client/0,
   72:          middle_box_tls13_client/1,
   73:          middle_box_tls12_enabled_client/0,
   74:          middle_box_tls12_enabled_client/1,
   75:          middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused/0,
   76:          middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused/1,
   77:          renegotiate_error/0,
   78:          renegotiate_error/1,
   79:          client_cert_fail_alert_active/0,
   80:          client_cert_fail_alert_active/1,
   81:          client_cert_fail_alert_passive/0,
   82:          client_cert_fail_alert_passive/1,
   83:          keylog_on_alert/0,
   84:          keylog_on_alert/1
   85:         ]).
   86: 
   87: 
   88: %% Test callback
   89: -export([check_session_id/2]).
   90: 
   91: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   92: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   93: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   94: all() -> 
   95:     [
   96:      cert_groups()
   97:     ].
   98: 
   99: groups() ->
  100:     [
  101:      {rsa, [], [reject_legacy_cert | tls_1_3_1_2_tests() ++ legacy_tests()]},
  102:      {ecdsa, [], tls_1_3_1_2_tests()}
  103:     ].
  104: 
  105: cert_groups() ->
  106:     [{group, rsa},
  107:      {group, ecdsa}].
  108: 
  109: tls_1_3_1_2_tests() ->
  110:     [tls13_client_tls12_server,
  111:      tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server,
  112:      tls12_client_tls13_server,
  113:      tls_client_tls12_server,
  114:      tls12_client_tls_server,
  115:      legacy_tls12_client_tls_server,
  116:      legacy_tls12_server_tls_client,
  117:      middle_box_tls13_client,
  118:      middle_box_tls12_enabled_client,
  119:      middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused,
  120:      renegotiate_error,
  121:      client_cert_fail_alert_active,
  122:      client_cert_fail_alert_passive,
  123:      keylog_on_alert
  124:     ].
  125: legacy_tests() ->
  126:     [tls_client_tls10_server,
  127:      tls_client_tls11_server,
  128:      tls_client_tls12_server,
  129:      tls10_client_tls_server,
  130:      tls11_client_tls_server,
  131:      tls12_client_tls_server,
  132:      tls13_client_tls11_server,
  133:      tls13_legacy_cert_sign,
  134:      tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae,
  135:      tls12_legacy_cert_sign,
  136:      tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae
  137:     ].
  138: 
  139: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  140:     catch crypto:stop(),
  141:     try crypto:start() of
  142: 	ok ->
  143:             case ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of                
  144:                 true ->
  145:                     ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
  146:                     [{client_type, erlang}, {server_type, erlang} | 
  147:                      Config];
  148:                 false ->
  149:                     {skip, "Insufficient crypto support for TLS-1.3"}
  150:             end
  151:     catch _:_ ->
  152: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  153:     end.
  154: 
  155: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  156:     ssl:stop(),
  157:     application:stop(crypto).
  158: 
  159: init_per_group(rsa, Config0) ->
  160:     Config = ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0),
  161:     COpts = proplists:get_value(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  162:     SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  163:     [{client_type, erlang},
  164:      {server_type, erlang},{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  165:      lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  166: init_per_group(ecdsa, Config0) ->
  167:     PKAlg = crypto:supports(public_keys),
  168:     case lists:member(ecdsa, PKAlg) andalso 
  169:         (lists:member(ecdh, PKAlg) orelse lists:member(dh, PKAlg)) of
  170:         true ->
  171:             Config = ssl_test_lib:make_ecdsa_cert(Config0),
  172:             COpts = proplists:get_value(client_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  173:             SOpts = proplists:get_value(server_ecdsa_opts, Config),
  174:             [{client_type, erlang},
  175:              {server_type, erlang},{client_cert_opts, COpts}, {server_cert_opts, SOpts} | 
  176:              lists:delete(server_cert_opts, lists:delete(client_cert_opts, Config))];
  177:         false ->
  178:             {skip, "Missing EC crypto support"}
  179:     end.
  180: 
  181: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  182:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  183: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  184: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  185: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  186: 
  187: tls13_client_tls12_server() ->
  188:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.2 server."}].
  189: 
  190: tls13_client_tls12_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  191:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} |
  192:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  193:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']},
  194:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  195:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  196:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  197: 
  198: 
  199:     
  200: tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server() ->
  201:      [{doc,"Test basic connection between TLS 1.2 server and TLS 1.3 client when " 
  202:        "client has TLS 1.3 specific extensions"}].
  203: 
  204: tls13_client_with_ext_tls12_server(Config) ->
  205:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  206:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  207: 
  208:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  209:                   {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  210:                   {signature_algs, [rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  211:                                     {sha256, rsa},
  212:                                     {sha256, ecdsa},
  213:                                     {sha, ecdsa}]}| ServerOpts0],
  214:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2','tlsv1.3']},
  215:                   {signature_algs_cert, [ecdsa_secp384r1_sha384,
  216:                                          ecdsa_secp256r1_sha256,
  217:                                          rsa_pss_rsae_sha256,
  218:                                          rsa_pkcs1_sha256,
  219:                                          ecdsa_sha1]}|ClientOpts0],
  220:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  221:    
  222: tls12_client_tls13_server() ->
  223:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server."}].
  224: 
  225: tls12_client_tls13_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
  226:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']} |
  227:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  228:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  229:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  230:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  231:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  232: 
  233: tls_client_tls10_server() ->
  234:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.0 server."}].
  235: tls_client_tls10_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  236:     CCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  237:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  238:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  239:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  240:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),        
  241:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  242:                   {ciphers, CCiphers} |
  243:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  244:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1']},
  245:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  246:                    {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1')}
  247:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  248:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  249: 
  250: tls_client_tls11_server() ->
  251:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.1 server."}].
  252: tls_client_tls11_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  253:     CCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  254:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  255:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  256:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  257:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),    
  258:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  259:                    ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  260:                   {ciphers, CCiphers} |
  261:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  262:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,['tlsv1.1']},
  263:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  264:                    {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.1')}  
  265:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  266:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  267: 
  268: tls_client_tls12_server() ->
  269:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0-1.3 client can connect to a TLS 1.2 server."}].
  270: tls_client_tls12_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  271:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  272:                    ['tlsv1', 'tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']} |
  273:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  274:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  275:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  276:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  277:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  278: 
  279: tls10_client_tls_server() ->
  280:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.0 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  281: tls10_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  282:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  283:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  284:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  285:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  286:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),    
  287:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1']},
  288:                   {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1')} |
  289:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  290:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  291:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  292:                    {ciphers, SCiphers} |
  293:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  294:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  295: 
  296: tls11_client_tls_server() ->
  297:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.1 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  298: tls11_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  299:     SCiphers = ssl:filter_cipher_suites(ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.3'),
  300:                                         [{key_exchange, fun(srp_rsa)  -> false;
  301:                                                            (srp_anon) -> false;
  302:                                                            (srp_dss) -> false;
  303:                                                            (_) -> true end}]),
  304:     
  305:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1']},
  306:                   {ciphers, ssl:cipher_suites(all, 'tlsv1.1')} |
  307:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  308:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  309:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  310:                    {ciphers, SCiphers} |
  311:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  312:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  313: 
  314: tls12_client_tls_server() ->
  315:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.0-1.3 server."}].
  316: tls12_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  317:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  318:                    ['tlsv1.2']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  319:     ServerOpts =  [{versions,
  320:                    ['tlsv1','tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']},
  321:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true} |
  322:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  323:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  324: 
  325: legacy_tls12_client_tls_server() ->
  326:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server."}].
  327: 
  328: legacy_tls12_client_tls_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  329:     SHA = ssl_test_lib:appropriate_sha(crypto:supports()),
  330:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.1', 'tlsv1.2']}, {signature_algs, [{SHA, rsa}, {SHA, ecdsa}]} |
  331:                   ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  332:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  333:                    {signature_algs, ssl:signature_algs(default, 'tlsv1.3')},
  334:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  335:                   | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  336:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  337: 
  338: legacy_tls12_server_tls_client() ->
  339:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 enabled client can connect to legacy TLS-1.2 server."}].
  340: 
  341: legacy_tls12_server_tls_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  342:     SHA = sha384,
  343:     Prop = proplists:get_value(tc_group_properties, Config),
  344:     Alg = proplists:get_value(name, Prop),
  345:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0, 
  346:       server_config := ServerOpts0} = ssl_test_lib:make_cert_chains_der(Alg, [{server_chain,
  347:                                                                                [[{digest, SHA}],
  348:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}],
  349:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}]]},
  350:                                                                               {client_chain,
  351:                                                                                [[{digest, SHA}],
  352:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}],
  353:                                                                                 [{digest, SHA}]]}
  354:                                                                              ]),
  355: 
  356:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']} | ClientOpts0],
  357:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']}, {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  358:                    {signature_algs, [{SHA, Alg}]}
  359:                   | ServerOpts0],
  360:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  361: 
  362: 
  363: tls13_legacy_cert_sign() ->
  364:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to  TLS-1.3 server with pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  365: 
  366: tls13_legacy_cert_sign(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  367:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']},
  368:                   {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs() ++ legacy_rsa_algs()}],
  369:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']},
  370:                   {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  371:                   {signature_algs_cert, legacy_rsa_algs()}],
  372: 
  373:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha256, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  374:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha512, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  375:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha384, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  376: 
  377: tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae() ->
  378:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 enabled client can connect to legacy TLS-1.2 server with legacy pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  379: 
  380: tls13_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  381:     ClientOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  382:                    {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  383:                    {signature_algs_cert, legacy_rsa_algs()}
  384:                   ],
  385:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  386:                   {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  387:                   {signature_algs_cert, legacy_rsa_algs()}
  388:                  ],
  389: 
  390:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha256, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  391:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha512, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  392:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha384, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  393: 
  394: tls12_legacy_cert_sign() ->
  395:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 client (with old configuration) can connect to  TLS-1.2 server with pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  396: 
  397: tls12_legacy_cert_sign(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  398:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  399:                   {signature_algs, rsa_algs()}],
  400:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  401:                   {signature_algs, rsa_algs()}],
  402: 
  403:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha256, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  404:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha512, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  405:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha384, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  406: 
  407: tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae() ->
  408:     [{doc,"Test that a modern TLS 1.2 client can connect to TLS-1.2 server with legacy pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  409: 
  410: tls12_legacy_cert_sign_with_pss_rsae(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  411:     ClientOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  412:                    {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs() ++ rsa_algs()}
  413:                   ],
  414:     ServerOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']},
  415:                   {signature_algs, rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  416:                   {signature_algs_cert, legacy_rsa_algs()}
  417:                  ],
  418: 
  419:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha256, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  420:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha512, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  421:     test_rsa_pcks1_cert(sha384, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  422: 
  423: reject_legacy_cert() ->
  424:     [{doc,"Test that client sends empty cert if does only have legacy pkcs1_SHA2 cert that is not supported by the server"
  425:       "and do not make connection with client that requires better cert and only option is legacy pkcs1_SHA2 cert"}].
  426: 
  427: reject_legacy_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  428:     reject_legacy_cert('tlsv1.3', certificate_required, Config),
  429:     reject_legacy_cert('tlsv1.2', handshake_failure, Config).
  430: 
  431: reject_legacy_cert(Version, Alert, Config) ->
  432:     COpts =  [{signature_algs, rsa_pss_pss_algs() ++ rsa_pss_rsae_algs()},
  433:               {versions, [Version]}
  434:              ],
  435:     SOpts = [{verify, verify_peer},
  436:              {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true},
  437:              {signature_algs, rsa_pss_pss_algs()},
  438:              {versions, [Version]}
  439:             ],
  440:     #{client_config := ClientOpts0,
  441:       server_config := ServerOpts0} =
  442:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{client_chain =>
  443:                                         #{root => root_key(sha256),
  444:                                           intermedites => intermediates(sha256, 1),
  445:                                           peer => peer_key(sha256)}, 
  446:                                     server_chain => 
  447:                                         #{root => root_key(sha256, ssl_test_lib:pss_params(sha256)),
  448:                                           intermedites => intermediates(sha256, 
  449:                                                                         ssl_test_lib:pss_params(sha256), 
  450:                                                                         1),
  451:                                           peer => peer_key(sha256, ssl_test_lib:pss_params(sha256))
  452:                                          }}),   
  453:     ClientOpts = ClientOpts0 ++ COpts,
  454:     ServerOpts = ServerOpts0 ++ SOpts,
  455:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, Alert),
  456:     RevClientOpts = ServerOpts0 ++ [{signature_algs, rsa_pss_pss_algs()}],
  457:     RevServerOtps = ClientOpts0 ++ [{signature_algs, rsa_pss_pss_algs() ++ rsa_pss_rsae_algs()}],
  458:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(RevClientOpts,  RevServerOtps, Config, insufficient_security).
  459: 
  460: middle_box_tls13_client() ->
  461:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client can connect to a 1.3 server with and without middle box compatible mode."}].
  462: middle_box_tls13_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  463:     ClientOpts = [{versions,
  464:                    ['tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  465:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} |
  466:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  467:     middlebox_test(true, not_empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  468:     middlebox_test(false, empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  469: 
  470: middle_box_tls12_enabled_client() ->
  471:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.2 enabled client can connect to a TLS 1.3 server with and without middle box compatible mode."}].
  472: middle_box_tls12_enabled_client(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  473:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.2', 'tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  474:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} |
  475:                    ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  476:     middlebox_test(true, not_empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config),
  477:     middlebox_test(false, empty, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config).
  478: 
  479: middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused() ->
  480:     [{doc, "Test that TLS-1.3 middlebox enabled client can reuse TLS-1.2 session when talking to TLS-1.2 server"}].
  481: middle_box_client_tls_v2_session_reused(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  482:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  483:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  484:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  485: 
  486:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  487: 					{from, self()},
  488:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  489:                                         {options, [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  490:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  491:     {_Client, CSock} = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket, {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  492:                                                   {host, Hostname},
  493:                                                   {from, self()},
  494:                                                   {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  495:                                                   {options,
  496:                                                    [{versions, ['tlsv1.2']}, {reuse_sessions, save}| ClientOpts]}]),
  497:     Server ! listen,
  498:     {ok,[{session_id, SessionId}, {session_data, SessData}]} = ssl:connection_information(CSock, [session_id, session_data]),
  499:     {_Client1, CSock1}  = ssl_test_lib:start_client([return_socket,
  500:                                                      {node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  501:                                                      {host, Hostname},
  502:                                                      {from, self()},
  503:                                                      {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  504:                                                      {options,
  505:                                                       [{versions, ['tlsv1.3', 'tlsv1.2']},
  506:                                                        {middlebox_comp_mode, true},
  507:                                                        {reuse_session, {SessionId, SessData}} | ClientOpts]}]),
  508:     {ok,[{session_id, SessionId}]}  = ssl:connection_information(CSock1, [session_id]).
  509: 
  510: renegotiate_error() ->
  511:     [{doc, "Test that an error is returned when ssl:renegotiate/1 is called on a connection running TLS-1.3"}].
  512: renegotiate_error(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  513:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  514:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config),
  515:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config),
  516: 
  517:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  518: 					{from, self()},
  519:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, send_recv_result_active, []}},
  520:                                         {options, [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ServerOpts]}]),
  521:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  522:     Options = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ClientOpts],
  523:     case ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, Options) of
  524:         {ok, Socket} ->
  525:             {error, notsup} = ssl:renegotiate(Socket);
  526:         {error, Reason} ->
  527:             ct:fail(Reason)
  528:     end.
  529: 
  530: client_cert_fail_alert_active() ->
  531:     [{doc, "Check that we receive alert message"}].
  532: client_cert_fail_alert_active(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  533:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  534:     {_ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  535:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  536:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  537:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  538: 
  539:     NewClientCertFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "client_invalid_cert.pem"),
  540:     create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts0),
  541: 
  542:     ClientOpts = [{active, true},
  543:                   {verify, verify_peer},
  544:                   {certfile, NewClientCertFile} | proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0)],
  545:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}| ServerOpts0],
  546:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  547:                                         {from, self()},
  548:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  549:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  550:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  551:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
  552:     receive
  553:         {Server, {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca, _}}}} ->
  554:             receive
  555:                 {ssl_error, Socket, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca, _}}} ->
  556:                     ok
  557:             after 500 ->
  558:                     ct:fail(no_acticv_msg)
  559:             end
  560:     end.
  561: 
  562: client_cert_fail_alert_passive() ->
  563:     [{doc, "Check that recv or setopts return alert"}].
  564: client_cert_fail_alert_passive(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  565:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  566:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  567:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  568:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  569:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  570: 
  571:     NewClientCertFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "client_invalid_cert.pem"),
  572:     create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts0),
  573: 
  574:     ClientOpts = [{active, false},
  575:                   {verify, verify_peer},
  576:                   {certfile, NewClientCertFile} | proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0)],
  577:     ServerOpts = [{verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}| ServerOpts0],
  578:     alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, recv,
  579:                   ServerNode, Hostname),
  580:     alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, setopts,
  581:                   ServerNode, Hostname).
  582: 
  583: tls13_client_tls11_server() ->
  584:     [{doc,"Test that a TLS 1.3 client gets old server alert from TLS 1.0 server."}].
  585: tls13_client_tls11_server(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  586:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_cert_opts, Config)],
  587:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1']} | ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_cert_opts, Config)],
  588:     ssl_test_lib:basic_alert(ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config, insufficient_security).
  589: 
  590: keylog_on_alert() ->
  591:     [{doc,"Test that keep_secrets callback, if specified, "
  592:       "is called with keylog info if alert is raised"}].
  593: 
  594: keylog_on_alert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  595:     ssl:clear_pem_cache(),
  596:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  597:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_client, client_cert_opts, Config),
  598:     ServerOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(extra_server, server_cert_opts, Config),
  599:     PrivDir = proplists:get_value(priv_dir, Config),
  600:     NewClientCertFile = filename:join(PrivDir, "client_invalid_cert.pem"),
  601:     create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts0),
  602:     ClientOpts = [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']}, {active, false}, {certfile, NewClientCertFile}|
  603:                   proplists:delete(certfile, ClientOpts0)],
  604:     ServerOpts =  [{versions, ['tlsv1.3']},
  605:                    {verify, verify_peer}, {fail_if_no_peer_cert, true}
  606:                   | ServerOpts0],
  607:   
  608:     Me = self(),
  609:     Fun = fun(AlertInfo) ->
  610:                   Me ! {alert_info, AlertInfo}
  611:           end,
  612:     alert_passive([{keep_secrets, Fun} | ServerOpts], ClientOpts, recv,
  613:                   ServerNode, Hostname),
  614:     receive
  615:         {alert_info, #{items := SKeyLog}} ->
  616:             case SKeyLog of
  617:                 ["CLIENT_HANDSHAKE_TRAFFIC_SECRET"++_,_|_] ->
  618:                     ok;
  619:                 SOther ->
  620:                     ct:fail({server_received, SOther})
  621:             end
  622:     end,
  623:     
  624:     alert_passive(ServerOpts, [{keep_secrets, Fun} | ClientOpts], recv,
  625:                   ServerNode, Hostname),
  626:     receive
  627:         {alert_info, #{items := CKeyLog}} ->
  628:             case CKeyLog of
  629:                 ["CLIENT_HANDSHAKE_TRAFFIC_SECRET"++_,_,_|_] ->
  630:                     ok;
  631:             COther ->
  632:                     ct:fail({client_received, COther})
  633:             end
  634:     end.
  635: 
  636: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  637: %% Internal functions and callbacks -----------------------------------
  638: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  639: 
  640: middlebox_test(Mode, Expected, ClientOpts, ServerOpts, Config) ->
  641:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  642:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  643: 					{from, self()},
  644:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_session_id, [Expected]}},
  645:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  646:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  647:     Client = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode}, {port, Port},
  648: 					{host, Hostname},
  649:                                         {from, self()},
  650:                                         {mfa, {?MODULE, check_session_id, [Expected]}},
  651:                                         {options,
  652:                                          [{middlebox_comp_mode, Mode}| ClientOpts]}]),
  653:     ssl_test_lib:check_result(Server, ok, Client, ok).
  654: 
  655: check_session_id(Socket, Expected) ->
  656:    {ok, [{session_id, SessionId}]} = ssl:connection_information(Socket, [session_id]),
  657:     case {Expected, SessionId} of
  658:         {empty, <<>>} ->
  659:             ok;
  660:         {not_empty, SessionId} when SessionId =/= <<>> ->
  661:             ok;
  662:         _ ->
  663:             {nok, {{expected, Expected}, {got, SessionId}}}
  664:     end.
  665: 
  666: alert_passive(ServerOpts, ClientOpts, Function,
  667:               ServerNode, Hostname) ->
  668:     Server = ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  669:                                         {from, self()},
  670:                                         {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  671:                                         {options, ServerOpts}]),
  672:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  673:     {ok, Socket} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
  674:     ct:sleep(500),
  675:     case Function of
  676:         recv ->
  677:             {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca,_}}} = ssl:recv(Socket, 0);
  678:         setopts ->
  679:             {error, {tls_alert, {unknown_ca,_}}} = ssl:setopts(Socket, [{active, once}])
  680:     end.
  681: 
  682: create_bad_client_certfile(NewClientCertFile, ClientOpts) ->
  683:     KeyFile =  proplists:get_value(keyfile, ClientOpts),
  684:     [KeyEntry] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(KeyFile),
  685:     Key = ssl_test_lib:public_key(public_key:pem_entry_decode(KeyEntry)),
  686:     ClientCertFile = proplists:get_value(certfile, ClientOpts),
  687: 
  688:     [{'Certificate', ClientDerCert, _}] = ssl_test_lib:pem_to_der(ClientCertFile),
  689:     ClientOTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(ClientDerCert, otp),
  690:     ClientOTPTbsCert = ClientOTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
  691:     NewClientDerCert = public_key:pkix_sign(ClientOTPTbsCert, Key),
  692:     ssl_test_lib:der_to_pem(NewClientCertFile, [{'Certificate', NewClientDerCert, not_encrypted}]).
  693: 
  694: test_rsa_pcks1_cert(SHA, COpts, SOpts, Config) ->
  695:     #{client_config := ClientOpts,
  696:       server_config := ServerOpts} =
  697:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => root_key(SHA),
  698:                                                       intermediates => intermediates(SHA, 1),
  699:                                                       peer => peer_key(SHA)},
  700:                                     client_chain => #{root => root_key(SHA),
  701:                                                       intermediates => intermediates(SHA, 1),
  702:                                                       peer => peer_key(SHA)}}),
  703:     ssl_test_lib:basic_test(COpts ++ ClientOpts, SOpts ++ ServerOpts, Config).
  704: 
  705: root_key(SHA) ->
  706:     root_key(SHA, undefined).
  707: 
  708: peer_key(SHA) ->
  709:     peer_key(SHA, undefined).
  710: 
  711: intermediates(SHA, N) ->
  712:     intermediates(SHA, undefined, N).
  713: 
  714: root_key(SHA, undefined) ->
  715:     %% As rsa keygen is not guaranteed to be fast
  716:     [{digest, SHA},{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6)}];
  717: root_key(SHA, Params) ->
  718:     [{digest, SHA}, {key, {ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(6), Params}}].
  719: 
  720: peer_key(SHA, undefined) ->
  721:     %% As rsa keygen is not guaranteed to be fast
  722:     [{digest, SHA}, {key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5)}];
  723: peer_key(SHA, Params) ->
  724:      [{digest, SHA}, {key, {ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(5), Params}}].
  725: 
  726: intermediates(SHA, undefined, N) when N =< 2 ->
  727:     Default = lists:duplicate(N, [{digest, SHA}]),
  728:     %% As rsa keygen is not guaranteed to be fast
  729:     hardcode_rsa_keys(Default, N, []);
  730: intermediates(SHA, Params, N) when N =< 2 ->
  731:     Default = lists:duplicate(N, [{digest, SHA}]),
  732:     %% As rsa keygen is not guaranteed to be fast
  733:     hardcode_rsa_keys(Default, Params, N, []).
  734: 
  735: hardcode_rsa_keys([], 0, Acc) ->
  736:     Acc;
  737: hardcode_rsa_keys([Head | Tail], N, Acc) ->
  738:     hardcode_rsa_keys(Tail, N-1, [[{key, ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(N)} | Head] | Acc]).
  739: 
  740: hardcode_rsa_keys([], _, 0, Acc) ->
  741:     Acc;
  742: hardcode_rsa_keys([Head | Tail], Params, N, Acc) ->
  743:     hardcode_rsa_keys(Tail, N-1, [[{key, {ssl_test_lib:hardcode_rsa_key(N)}, Params} | Head] | Acc]).
  744: 
  745: rsa_algs() ->
  746:     [{sha512, rsa}, {sha384, rsa}, {sha256, rsa}].
  747: 
  748: legacy_rsa_algs() ->
  749:     [rsa_pkcs1_sha512,rsa_pkcs1_sha384,rsa_pkcs1_sha256].
  750: 
  751: rsa_pss_rsae_algs() ->
  752:     [rsa_pss_rsae_sha512,rsa_pss_rsae_sha384,rsa_pss_rsae_sha256].
  753: 
  754: rsa_pss_pss_algs() ->
  755:     [rsa_pss_pss_sha512,rsa_pss_pss_sha384,rsa_pss_pss_sha256].
